Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game objects represent entire playthroughs of the game. In any playthrough of the game, exacty one Game object should be created. They contain all components related to the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.CardLayout cardLayout
      The CardLayout of the main panel, which contains all the sub panels of the game.
      private javax.swing.JFrame frame
      The frame of the main game window.
      private GameEnvironment game
      The GameEnvironment object for the current game.
      private javax.swing.JPanel mainPanel
      The main panel in the game window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Create the application.

        private javax.swing.JPanel mainPanel
        The main panel in the game window. Fills the whole frame, and contains all the content of the game.

      • endGame

        public void endGame(boolean won)
        Ends the current game by displaying a victory panel or defeat panel as appropriate.
        Parameters:
        won - true if the team won the game, false otherwise.
